item.title: Build: Clicker
item.description: Buildlog: Clicker ğŸ”—Sneak peek ğŸ”—Clicker diorama. Meta ğŸ”—The Clicker is a creature (?) in the world of The Last of Us, made by Naughty Dog. Clicker. The Clickers are originally humans, that have fallen to a fungus infection. The fungus, of the Cordyceps genus, affects, takes over, control over the body. It is famously documented on insects in the Planet Earth documentary, however the human infection is a fictious extrapolation as a plot device.
